data.name: Renewal package Spotify 1 year
data.detail_desc: Spotify  is a digital music, podcast and video streaming service that gives you access to millions of songs and other content from artists around the world. Basic functions like music streaming are completely free, but you can also choose to upgrade to  Spotify Premium . Spotify  works across multiple devices, including computers, phones, tablets, speakers, TVs, and cars. You can easily switch from one device to another using  Spotify Connect .

data.name: Renewal Youtobe Premium
data.desc: With YouTube Premium, you can watch millions of videos
data.detail_desc: With YouTube Premium, you can watch millions of videos without ads. Ads include both pre- and in-video ads as well as banner ads, search ads, and video overlay ads. You may still see ads or brands embedded in creator content that YouTube does not control. Ad-free video is supported on all devices and platforms where you can sign in with your Google account, including on compatible smart TVs/game consoles and the YouTube, YouTube Music apps , YouTube Gaming, and YouTube Kids for mobile if they're available in your location.

data.name: Discord Nitro
data.desc: Promotion from Discord and partners for accounts
data.detail_desc: Promotion from Discord and partners for accounts that have never activated Nitro, receive 3 months of using Discord Nitro. Divine Shop supports users without international payment cards to receive incentives with a fee of only 149,000 VND. Customers fill in their Discord account information and pay for this product, Divine Shop will complete the activation of the package for you. Customize your four digit card, for example Divine#7828 can change to Divine#4869. Experience video in high resolution 720p and 1080p when using the streaming feature. You will now be able to increase your upload speed from 8MB all the way up to 100MB.

Graphics software that includes many useful features to help create and share a variety of UI/UX designs for mobile apps and websites. Professional website design and programming software.

data.name: Premium Edition (GTA 5) Account
data.detail_desc: The Steam account you receive after purchase is 100% new and never used. To ensure safety, please update your personal information to your account as soon as you receive it from the shop. The steps are as follows. From now on you can log in with your account using the new password you just set.
data.label: Features

data.name: Scrap Mechanic
data.desc: Tools and enter the creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic
data.detail_desc: Tools and enter the creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic ! Build awesome machines, go on adventures with your friends and defend against evil Farmerbots in this imaginative multiplayer survival sandbox. With Scrap Mechanic's powerful creative tools, you can design your own adventures! They say: 'Become a robot mechanic'. They say: 'Easy money'. We're pretty sure the job description doesn't mention the crash landing on a distant planet, with thousands of robot workers frantic bloodshed! You are stranded on a distant farming planet where the Farmbots working in the fields have disappeared. With your tool belts tight, there's only one way to survive: use your quick thinking, creativity, and knack for turning your surroundings to your advantage!
data.label: Sale off

data.name: Resident evil 4 / biohazard 4
data.desc: In Resident Evil 4 , special agent Leon S
data.detail_desc: In Resident Evil 4 , special agent Leon S. Kennedy is sent on a mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of the US President. Making his way to a rural European village, he faces new threats that are a departure from the traditional slow zombie enemies of previous installments in the series. Leon battles terrible new creatures infected by a new threat called Las Plagas and faces a group of ferocious enemies including mind-controlled villagers linked to the Los Illuminados. , the mysterious cult behind the kidnapping. Stunning HD runs at smooth 60fps for the first time. A complete visual overhaul has been carried out to bring this revered title to the highest graphic quality ever. Fully optimized for widescreen, text is sharpened and textures enhanced on characters, backgrounds, and in-game objects. Steam platform support with Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Trading Cards, global leaderboards, and full game controller support. Native keyboard and mouse support with customizable keybinding, mouse sensitivity, and mouse acceleration settings

data.name: Battlefield 1 Revolution
data.detail_desc: When you make a purchase, Divine Shop will log into the Origin account that you fill in to buy the game, and then notify you via Email. If you receive an email notifying you that your order has been completed, you can log back into Origin to download and play the game. The Red Baron Pack, Lawrence of Arabia Pack and Hellfighter Pack add new weapons, vehicles and emblems based on popular heroes and units.

data.name: Apex Legends - 4000 (+350 Bonus) Apex Coins
data.desc: Apex Coins are the in-game virtual currency
data.detail_desc: Apex Coins are the in-game virtual currency, which can be used to buy new items for characters and buy weapons in the ingame shop. Apex Coins can also be used to purchase Apex Pack cosmetics and to unlock new characters through the in-game shop.
data.label: Features

data.name: Grammarly Premium
data.desc: Grammarly is an English grammar checking tool that helps English
data.detail_desc:
Grammarly is an English grammar checking tool that helps English writers confidently write English professionally. 

The message of this software says that interesting thing “Become a Better Writer”. Grammarly allows users to use it on up to 5 devices.  Yes. You can use it on both Android and iOS phones. For iOS, your phone must be running version 11.2 or later, and Android is version 7.0 or later. Whether you have a Grammarly Free or Premium account, your document inspection limits remain the same. In a 30-day period of use, you can only check 300 documents and 150000 words. In 1 day, you can check up to 100 documents and 50000 words.
